entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a .http file to the API project template #47675
    8.0-preview4
  • SignalR npm package not able to be bundled using `esbuild` #47674
  • CA1512 build error when building aspnetcore with latest SDK version #47673
  • Performance degradation in PersistingComponentStateSubscription #47669
  • Unified app model routing #47668
    8.0-preview4
  • Combined use of @bind-Value:set, @bind-Value:get @bind-Value:event does not work #47661

Closed

  • 503 error with InProcess hosting, completely fine with OutOfProcess hosting #47518
  • Add DefaultPooledObjectPolicy<T>.Instance #47372
  • Google auth sign in without User becoming authenticated #47590
  • add user role permissions for blazor united #47591
  • Allow inheriting from a base page without requiring `base.BuildRenderTree(__builder)` #47538
  • GetApplicationPartManager uses environment variable ApplicationName to get entryAssemblyName is that the expected behavior? If we override ApplicationName, app crashes #47643
  • How to get the razor code from a RenderFragment? #47665
  • Warning when doing RenderFragment closures #47662
  • Extending TypedResults static class functionality #47642
  • Honor default value provided in parameters for route handlers #47266
    8.0-preview4
  • Capture original exception in DeveloperExceptionPage middleware #47658
  • WithOpenApi adds Empty requestBody when parameter is of type string[] or StringValues #47644
    8.0-preview4
  • Make successful authentication scheme available from HttpContext object #47646
  • Log on reset socket even if the logger is disabled #47620

PullRequests

Created

  • [blazor] Configure mono runtime with startupMemoryCache and runtimeOptions #47670
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4
  • http.sys - remove all GC pins in primary write path #47666
    area-runtime
  • Register AuthN/Z middleware automatically in CreateSlimBuilder #47664
    area-runtime, area-hosting
  • Add [RequiresUnreferencedCode] attribute to top level APIs. #47663
    needs-area-label
  • Reset ConnectProtocol during reset #47660
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #47652
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.17
  • Update downlevel SiteExtension versions #47655
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Add metrics to ASP.NET Core #46834
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Don't generate RequestBody for parameters when disabledInferredBody is true #47659
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Return 400 bad request when IOException is thrown when ready form. #47584
    area-runtime
  • Make HttpLogging middleware endpoint aware #47595
    area-runtime
  • Use WaitHandle in Kestrel heartbeat to quickly exit thread on stop #47619
    area-runtime
  • Update README.md #47641
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Specialize pipeline for MapRazorComponents #47649
    area-blazor
  • Update LoginDisplay.IndividualB2CAuth.razor #47654
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add support for logging/throwing exceptions in RDG #47657
    area-runtime
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • change 'ValuesController' to 'ValueController' #47474
    area-mvc, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Extend ControllerBase.Problem that can add extensions to ProblemDetails #47539
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4
